text: Jesse Eisenberg and Connie Nielsen are set to star in the new Justice League film, which will be released November 17, 2017. The film already stars Ben Affleck as Batman, Gal Gadot as Wonder Woman, Ezra Miller as The Flash, Ray Fisher as Cyborg, Jason Momoa as Aquaman, Amber Heard as Mera and Henry Cavill as Superman. Jesse has already starred as Lex Luthor in Batman v Superman : Dawn Of Justice and Connie plays Hippolyta in Wonder Woman.
